name: Flask
body:
![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/seppaleinen/flask/badge.svg?branch=master)
![Code Health](https://landscape.io/github/seppaleinen/flask/master/landscape.svg?style=flat)

Flask testapp###

to run server#
python runserver.py
 * Running on http://localhost:5000/

to run tests#
python runtests.py

to run tests with coverage#
coverage run --source application runtests.py

to see coverage result#
coverage report -m For text output
coverage html For html output

to install dependencies#
pip install -r requirements.txt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
